page.title: 10HEALTH IN WGC.
page.content: Although it is not in our block, the { {Queen Elizabeth II Hospital }is closely linked to the town{Health {Centre. }This health centre caters for people requiring{Doctors, {Dentists, Chiropodists }and {Baby {Clinics. }The clinic is mainly open in the mornings and employs {14 }people part-time.The only {Doctors }in our area are based in the clinic. There is a{Dentist }in the clinic and a surgery of {3 }more close by. There are {4 } {nurses }& {midwives }supplementing each of the {2 doctors. 4 welfare {workers }and {1 welfare assistant } are based at the clinic. Emergencies and accident victims are taken directly to the hospital.The {Health {Centre }can refer people to the hospital for more detailed diagnosis.
